title: Christ the Center
verse: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here!

title: Christ the Center
verse: I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live, but Christ who lives in me.

title: Obedience to Christ
verse: I appeal to you therefore, brothers, by the mercies of God, to present your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and acceptable to God.

title: Obedience to Christ
verse: Whoever has my commandments and keeps them is the one who loves me.

title: The Word
verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness.

title: The Word
verse: This Book of the Law shall not depart from your mouth, but you shall meditate on it day and night.

title: Prayer
verse: If you remain in me and my words remain in you, ask whatever you wish, and it will be done for you.

title: Prayer
verse: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

title: Fellowship
verse: For where two or three gather in my name, there am I with them.

title: Fellowship
verse: Let us consider how we may spur one another on toward love and good deeds, not giving up meeting together.

title: Witnessing
verse: Come, follow me, and I will send you out to fish for people.

title: Witnessing
verse: For I am not ashamed of the gospel, because it is the power of God that brings salvation to everyone who believes.

title: All Have Sinned
verse: For all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God.

title: All Have Sinned
verse: We all, like sheep, have gone astray, each of us has turned to our own way.

title: Sin's Penalty
verse: For the wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.

title: Sin's Penalty
verse: Just as people are destined to die once, and after that to face judgment.

title: Christ Paid the Penalty
verse: But God demonstrates his own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

title: Christ Paid the Penalty
verse: For Christ also suffered once for sins, the righteous for the unrighteous, to bring you to God.

title: Salvation is not by Works
verse: For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith—and this is not from yourselves, it is the gift of God—not by works.

title: Salvation is not by Works
verse: He saved us, not because of righteous things we had done, but because of his mercy.

title: Must Receive Christ
verse: Yet to all who did receive him, to those who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God.
